item.title: Custom Spec
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

I made this custom spec, it goes in Clickingmost.java. But its not doing the spec? Any help? (Ivâ€™e tested on npcs and players) heres the code:

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 11010 && c.specialAmount <= 99) {//energy sword
c.sM("You do not have enough special energy left.");
}
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 11010 && c.specialAmount >= 100) {//energy sword
c.strPot = true;
c.strPotTimer = 20;
c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
c.cba = c.abc / 10;
c.abc2 = c.cba * 2;
if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
c.abc2 = 2;
}
c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.setAnimation(1670);
c.lowGFX(247, 0);
c.specialAmount -= 100;
c.specTimer = 70;
c.plrText = "For Halo!";
c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic
